page.title: 19RECREATION IN IGHTHAM
page.content: The Village Hall is well used by many village groups and organisations. These include; Playschool, Badminton, Luncheon Club, Women's Institute. Other things which take place in the Hall are Wedding Receptions and plays put on by the Ightham Players.The horticulural society and historical society also meet in the Hall. The village hall was built in the 1920's,but they have had a new bit put on which was built in 1965. Some time ago the inside was all changed round.The stage used to be where the kitchen is now. There have been four robberies from the Hall. The first three money was stolen. The last time all the players costumes were taken. There are four main rooms - the main hall, two committee rooms and the kitchen.
